document_data.name: Bashful Esmelda's
document_data.mainbody: '''Bashful Esmelda's''' was a [[festhall]] and tavern in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The festhall was built in northern Esmeltaran.
document_data.Services: The place provided fairly good services at cheap prices. Many male customers were lured in by the [[illusion]]-enhanced signpost that showed the indistinct form of a woman bathing in a lake.
